thread.title: EagleRider's Event Outposts Encompass the United States
thread.title_full: EagleRider's Event Outposts Encompass the United States - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: EagleRider's Event Outposts Encompass the United States
text:
EagleRider
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 2, Motorcycle events run through all times of the year throughout all areas of the globe, and wherever great times, great friends, and great motorcycles are to be found, EagleRider is never far.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150929/271712LOGO
Here are just some of the biggest upcoming motorcycle events where EagleRider will establish forward outposts to support all involved in the goal of fulfilling dreams and creating unforgettable memories. Be sure to mark your calendar and arrange for your dream motorcycle to accompany you on the events of your choice!
Florida - Biketoberfest 10/15/2015/ - 10/18/2015
Florida - Panama City Beach Rally 10/21/2015 - 10/25/2015
Texas - Lone Star Rally 11/05/2015-11/08/2015
Florida - Daytona Bike Week 03/04/2016 - 03/16/2016
Arizona - Arizona Bike Week 4/6/2016 - 4/10/2016
Florida - Leesburg Bikefest 4/22/2016 - 4/24/2016
Founder and CEO of EagleRider Chris McIntyre was available for comment on the event outposts: "The stronger EagleRider becomes, the more potential we have to reach out and support the motorcycle community in all its endeavors beyond the boundaries of our established locations. It fills us with pride when people steeped in the motorcycle community say that we seem to be 'everywhere' because our goal has always been to open the gates to adventure and passion to as many people in the World as we can."
ABOUT EAGLERIDER
Pioneering the motorcycle rental concept in 1992, EagleRider has since extended its branches to become a motorcycle experience industry giant offering services of all kinds to assist and empower motorcyclists and travelers worldwide. Whether you simply would like to try out the motorcycle of your dreams or go on a great adventure in the self-drive and guided tours offered from any one of our beautifully located 100+ locations across the globe, EagleRider offers the world's favorite brands including Harley-Davidson速, Indian速, Honda速 and BMW速 in motorcycles as well as Scooters, Dirt Bikes, and ATV's. We also provide motorcycle service, parts, and accessories in addition to a vast array of solutions for individuals as well as dealers that are looking to buy and/or sell their bikes.
For more information on rentals and tours, please visit www.EagleRider.com . If you are interested in buying and/or selling a bike, visit www.UsedMotorcycles.net . Our inventory of parts and accessories can be found at Store.EagleRider.com .
Contact: Press@EagleRider.com
